title: "Ryan P Larson"
---

Ryan Larson is an Assistant Professor of Criminology at Hamline University. 

His research investigates the complex relationships between crime, punishment, and stratification/inequality using quantitative and computational methods. 

Dr. Larson engages in quantitative and computational consulting for various research projects in the Twin Cities, please contact him at [rlarson21@hamline.edu](mailto:rlarson21@hamline.edu) for more information.
